siteMetadata.title: A11yTalks
siteMetadata.subtitle: Virtual monthly meet-up group that features speakers & conversations around the topic of digital accessibility.

frontmatter.title: Why Dyslexic Narratives Matter in Tech
frontmatter.subtitle: Jeannette Washington
frontmatter.description: There has never been a better time to consider how your skills can be harnessed within the tech industry. The tech jobs of tomorrow require your narrative. After all, technology will only be as good as the people that it does the least for. Join in this month while we discuss Jeannette Washingtonâ€™s new book, Technical Difficulties: Why Dyslexic Narratives Matter In Tech.
